title: Infographic: Vaccine development for infectious disease
author: Tiffany Garbutt; PhD
description: Researchers are conducting the first long-term perspective study to understand the immune response to COVID-19 long after initial infection.
cleaned_text: for infectious disease Vaccine development for infectious diseases gives rise to new vaccine approaches and accelerated development and approval timelines. Traditional vaccine development and approval take approximately 10-15 years. The vaccine development timeline for SARS-CoV-2 continues to accelerate as new discoveries and approvals happen every day, but the accelerated vaccine development timeline for the novel SARS-CoV-2 virus is not unique. Throughout history, the world has grappled with the emergence of other viral epidemics that have required the flexibility of vaccine development and approval timelines.
